verses.name: Exodus 39:11
verses.text: And the second row, an emerald, a sapphire, and a diamond.

verses.name: Exodus 39:12
verses.text: And the third row, a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.

verses.name: Exodus 39:13
verses.text: And the fourth row, a beryl, an onyx, and a jasper: they were inclosed in ouches of gold in their inclosings.

verses.name: Exodus 39:14
verses.text: And the stones were according to the names of the children of Israel, twelve, according to their names, like the engravings of a signet, every one with his name, according to the twelve tribes.

verses.name: Exodus 39:15
verses.text: And they made upon the breastplate chains at the ends, of wreathen work of pure gold.
